remarks: Convert a multivariate polynomial function to univariate. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2015.)
statement:
pf1rcl.q $e |- Q = ran ( eval1 ` R ) $.
pf1f.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
mpfpf1.q $e |- E = ran ( 1o eval R ) $.
mpfpf1 $p |- ( F e. E -> ( F o. ( y e. B |-> ( 1o X. { y } ) ) ) e. Q ) $.
$d B y $.
$d E y $.
$d F y $.
$d R y $.
